title: Zingah chi tha tuhin min hmangaihna chi kha
lyrics:
Zingah chi tha tuhin, min hmangaihna chi kha,
chawfak laia beiin, tlai lamah te pawh;
Lak hun tur lo nghakin, a hlawhtlin ring chungin,
Hlim takin kan haw ang, kan buhphal kengin.

Kan buhphal kengin, kan buhphal kengin,
Hlim takin kan haw ang, kan buhphal kengin;
Kan buhphal kengin, kan buhphal kengin,
Hlim takin kan haw ang, kan buhphal kengin.

Ni enga chi tuhin, hlimahte pawh khanin,
Chhum zing hlau lova, khaw vawt tuar peih pawhin;
Nakinah lak hunin, kan tum kha tlak zovin,
Hlim takin kan haw ang, kan buhphal kengin.

Lalpa tan chi tuhin, kal la bei hram hramin,
Lungngaihthlak tak thu lo thleng thin mah sela;
Kan lungngaih reh hunin, Lal Isuan min lawm ang,
Hlim takin kan haw ang, kan buhphal kengin.
